sign-up.failed.id-ID: Gagal registrasi, coba beberapa saat lagi.

sign-up.success.id-ID: Berhasil registrasi, silahkan masuk menggunakan akun anda.

sign-up.validation.failed.en: Failed register, some of data maybe not valid.
sign-up.validation.failed.id-ID: Gagal registrasi, beberapa data tidak sesuai.

sign-up.email.in-use.en: Email already use, try with another email.
sign-up.email.in-use.id-ID: Email sudah digunakan, silahkan gunakan email lain.

sign-up.email.confirmation.failed.id-ID: Verifikasi email gagal, coba beberapa saat lagi.

sign-up.email.confirmation.expire.id-ID: Verifikasi tidak valid atau sudah kadaluarsa.

sign-up.email.confirmation.success.en: Verification Success, you can sign in to your account.
sign-up.email.confirmation.success.id-ID: Verifikasi berhasil, silahkan masuk ke akun anda.

sign-in.email.failed.en: Sign in failed, try again later.
sign-in.email.failed.id-ID: Login gagal, coba beberapa saat lagi.

sign-in.email.user.not-confirmed.en: Sign in failed, you are not verify email, please check your inbox an try again.
sign-in.email.user.not-confirmed.id-ID: Login gagal, anda belum memverifikasi email, cek inbox anda.

forgot.password.request.failed.en: Failed to reset password, try again later.
forgot.password.request.failed.id-ID: Gagal mereset password, coba beberapa saat lagi.

forgot.password.validation.error.en: Failed to reset password, request invalid.
forgot.password.validation.error.id-ID: Gagal reset password, data tidak sesuai.

forgot.password.request.success.en: Reset password confirmation is sent to your email.
forgot.password.request.success.id-ID: Konfirmasi reset password dikirim ke email kamu.

forgot.password.verify.success.en: Verification success, you can set password.
forgot.password.verify.success.id-ID: Verifikasi berhasil, kamu bisa ubah password.

forgot.password.set-password.expire.en: Failed to set new password, session expired.
forgot.password.set-password.expire.id-ID: Gagal men-set password baru, sesi sudah kadaluarsa.

forgot.password.set-password.success.en: Reset password success, you can login with new password.
forgot.password.set-password.success.id-ID: Rest password berhasil, silahkan masuk menggunakan password baru kamu.
